title: With the inauguration of a state-of-the-art kitchen facility in Hyderabad, we aim to be one of the biggest pure food services players in the country, shares Rohit Sawhney, CEO, Elior India
description: Elior Group, led by CEO Daniel Derichebourg and Elior India CEO Rohit Sawhney, inaugurates a new kitchen facility in Hyderabad, focusing on growth and innovation in the Indian market.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
